element.name: rpbody
element.sql: SELECT t.name, t.kkm_number, SUM(t.tot) tot, SUM(t.nal) nal, SUM(t.bnal) bnal, SUM(t.cert) cert, SUM(t.sertsale) sertsale FROM (SELECT tip.name, tip.kkm_number, SUM(IF(h.type IN (0, 5), 1, -1) * p.amount) tot, SUM(IF(p.payment_id = 0, 1, 0) * IF(h.type IN (0, 5), 1, -1) * p.amount) nal, SUM(IF(p.payment_id != 0 AND p.payment_name NOT LIKE '%серт%', 1, 0) * IF(h.type IN (0, 5), 1, -1) * p.amount) bnal, SUM(IF(p.payment_id != 0 AND p.payment_name LIKE '%серт%', 1, 0) * IF(h.type IN (0, 5), 1, -1) * p.amount) cert, 0 sertsale FROM trm_out_receipt_header h INNER JOIN trm_out_receipt_footer f ON h.cash_id = f.cash_id AND h.id = f.id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_pos tip ON tip.cash_id = h.cash_id INNER JOIN trm_out_receipt_payment p ON p.cash_id = h.cash_id AND p.receipt_header = h.id LEFT OUTER JOIN trm_out_receipt_payment pp ON p.cash_id = pp.cash_id AND p.receipt_header = pp.receipt_header AND pp.link = p.id WHERE pp.link IS NULL AND p.type = 0 AND h.type IN (0, 5, 1, 4) AND f.result = 0 AND tip.store_id= :pstore AND f.`date` >= STR_TO_DATE( :pFrom , '%Y-%m-%d') AND f.`date` < DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE( :pTo , '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY tip.name, tip.kkm_number UNION ALL SELECT tip.name, tip.kkm_number, 0 tot, 0 nal, 0 bnal, 0 cert, SUM(ri.total * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), -1, 1)) sertsale FROM ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_header r INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_footer f USE INDEX (date) ON f.cash_id = r.cash_id AND f.id = r.id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_pos tip ON tip.cash_id = r.cash_id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_item ri ON ri.cash_id = r.cash_id AND ri.receipt_header = r.id AND ri.classif LIKE '.2001.%' WHERE f.result = 0 AND tip.store_id= :pstore AND f.`date` >= STR_TO_DATE( :pFrom , '%Y-%m-%d') AND f.`date` < DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE( :pTo , '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY tip.name, tip.kkm_number) t GROUP BY t.name, t.kkm_number
